com.kaleshwarsingh.addressbookmanager

Class AddressBookManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaleshwarsingh.addressbookmanager.AddressBookManager

  • public class AddressBookManager
extends Object
    This class allows you to create and manage multiple address books. It provides methods to create, edit, save, open, and sort address books.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressBookManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAddressBookWithoutSaving(String addressBookName)
      Closes the address book specified by the string addressBookName without saving.
      void closeAllWithoutSaving()
      Closes all open address books without saving.
      void closeAndSaveAddressBook(String addressBookName)
      Closes and saves the address book specified by the string addressBookName.
      void closeAndSaveAll()
      Closes and saves all open address books.
      AddressBook createAddressBook(String addressBookName)
      Creates and opens an address book with the name specified by the string addressBookName.

      Returns a reference to all open address books.
      AddressBook openAddressBook(String addressBookName)
      Opens a saved address book specified by the string addressBookName.
      void saveAddressBook(String addressBookName, String... fileName)
      Saves an open address book specified by the string addressBookName.
      void showOpenAddressBooks()
      Prints a list of the names of all open address books.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressBookManager

        public AddressBookManager()

    • Method Detail

      • createAddressBook

        public AddressBook createAddressBook(String addressBookName)
                              throws InvalidNameException
        Creates and opens an address book with the name specified by the string addressBookName.
        Parameters:
        addressBookName - A String representing the name of the new address book.
        Returns:
        A reference to the new AddressBook.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On empty address book name received.
        See Also:
        InvalidNameException

      • getAddressBooks

        public Map<String,AddressBook> getAddressBooks()
        Returns a reference to all open address books.
        Returns:
        A Map containing all open address books.

      • openAddressBook

        public AddressBook openAddressBook(String addressBookName)
                            throws IOException,
                                   ClassNotFoundException
        Opens a saved address book specified by the string addressBookName.
        Parameters:
        addressBookName - A String representing the name of the saved address book to open.
        Returns:
        A reference to the opened address book.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - On receiving a saved object that does not match the AddressBook class.
        IOException - On failure to open the file specified by addressBookName.

      • saveAddressBook

        public void saveAddressBook(String addressBookName,
                            String... fileName)
                     throws InvalidNameException,
                            IOException
        Saves an open address book specified by the string addressBookName. The address book is saved to a file with the filename being the string addressBookName. If the optional parameter fileName is specified the filename is that specified by the string fileName[0].
        Parameters:
        addressBookName - A String representing the name of the address book to save.
        fileName - An optional String parameter representing the filename of the file to which the address book will be saved.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On attempt to save an address book that is not open.
        IOException
        See Also:
        InvalidNameException

      • closeAndSaveAddressBook

        public void closeAndSaveAddressBook(String addressBookName)
                             throws InvalidNameException,
                                    IOException
        Closes and saves the address book specified by the string addressBookName.
        Parameters:
        addressBookName - A String representing the name of the address book to close and save.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On attempt to close and save an address book that is not open.
        IOException - On failure to open the file to save the address book to.
        See Also:
        IOException, InvalidNameException

      • closeAndSaveAll

        public void closeAndSaveAll()
                     throws InvalidNameException,
                            IOException
        Closes and saves all open address books.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On attempt to close and save an address book that is not open.
        IOException - On failure to open the file(s) to save the address books to.
        See Also:
        IOException, InvalidNameException

      • closeAddressBookWithoutSaving

        public void closeAddressBookWithoutSaving(String addressBookName)
                                   throws InvalidNameException
        Closes the address book specified by the string addressBookName without saving.
        Parameters:
        addressBookName - A String representing the name of the address book to close.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On attempt to close and address book that is not open.
        See Also:
        InvalidNameException

      • closeAllWithoutSaving

        public void closeAllWithoutSaving()
                           throws InvalidNameException
        Closes all open address books without saving.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException - On attempt to close an address book that is not open.

      • showOpenAddressBooks

        public void showOpenAddressBooks()
        Prints a list of the names of all open address books.
